issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Implement MIN and MAX aggregate expressions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6656](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6656). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement MIN and MAX aggregate expressions. See the SUM implementation for inspiration.
